titles.title: Ed Fountain Park Expansion Act
To provide for the conveyance of a United States Fish and Wildlife Service administrative site to the city of Las Vegas, Nevada.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans.

bill.summary: 11/16/2005--Introduced. Ed Fountain Park Expansion Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service, to convey to the city of Las Vegas, Nevada, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a specified administrative site for use by the City as a park or for any other recreation or nonprofit-related purpose.
